page.title: 19SCHOOLS
page.content:
This is a comparison between the three schools which compiled these pages. Two of these schools(Holmewood House and Knowle Court) are private, while Langton Primary is state run. {COMPARISON TABLE: KNOWLE LANGTON HOLMEWOOD COURT PRIMARY HOUSE FULL/PART- TIME STAFF: {6 6/1 36/14 PUPILS: { 75 180 400 FORMS: {5 6 27 AGE RANGE: {4-11 5-11 4-13 DAY START: {9.00 9.00 8.35 END OF DAY:{3.30 3.30 6.20 BOARDERS: { 0 0 100
Senior forms at Holmewood are taught by different subject teachers in 40 minute lessons. The forms at the other schools, and Holmewood junior forms, have a form teacher.{CONTINUED ON P.20
